Events that occurred on 24 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1956 - Ted Nasmith is born.
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 228.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Joan O. Falconer.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 332.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 347a.
2018 - Ursula K. Le Guin dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothlórien.
Gollum is captured by Uglúk. He later escapes. Saruman sends reinforcements to Uglúk; his troop is now about 180 strong.
